name: com.reachcloud.metaverse-cloud-sdk
description:
The Unity SDK for the Metaverse Cloud Engine

# Changelog

## 2.204.1
- Fixed compiler errors.

Updated on November 11, 2025

## 2.204.0
- Add BatchBuilderWindow for batch building and uploading MetaSpaces and MetaPrefabs

Updated on November 11, 2025

## 2.203.22
- Refactor LoginStore: Remove excessive logging and streamline token validation process

Updated on November 11, 2025

## 2.203.21
- Disable API client logging by commenting out the log message handler

Updated on November 07, 2025

## 2.203.20
- Refactor upload failure handling and retry logic in AssetEditor; streamline build target restoration in MetaverseAssetBundleAPI.

Updated on November 07, 2025

## 2.203.19
- fix: adjust PropertySpace attribute for action property in InputButtonEvent

Updated on November 07, 2025

## 2.203.18
- Add FixUnitConnectionDebugLogWarning to suppress excessive warning logs during Visual Scripting

Updated on November 07, 2025

## 2.203.17
- Implement error handling for model and classes file loading in SegFormer and YOLO components

Updated on November 07, 2025

## 2.203.16
- Implement retry functionality for asset build and upload failures

Updated on November 07, 2025

## 2.203.15
- Add FixUnitDebugLogWarning to suppress excessive Debug.LogWarning messages in Unit.cs

Updated on November 07, 2025
